code: import React,{useState}from"react";import Header from"./Header";import Footer from"./Footer";import Note from"./Note.jsx";import CreateArea from"./CreateArea";import axios from'axios';function App(){const[notes,setNotes]=useState([]);async function addNote(newNote){try{const result=await axios.post("https://localhost:".concat(process.env.port,"/routes/"),newNote);if(result){console.log("Note is added to DB"+result);}setNotes(prevNotes=>{return[...prevNotes,newNote];});}catch(error){console.error('A problem occurred adding or updating a record: ',error);}}async function deleteNote(id){try{const result=await axios.delete("https://localhost:".concat(process.env.port,"/routes/").concat(id));if(result){console.log("Note is deleted from DB");}setNotes(prevNotes=>{return prevNotes.filter((noteItem,index)=>{return index!==id;});});}catch(error){console.error('A problem occurred while deleting a record: ',error);}}return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Header,null),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(CreateArea,{onAdd:addNote}),notes.map((noteItem,index)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Note,{key:index,id:index,title:noteItem.title,content:noteItem.content,onDelete:deleteNote});}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Footer,null));}export default App;
